title: Taliyah ruined
body:
6.14 has ruined an otherwise decent champ.

Nerfing the AP ratios might have been necessary but imho the W was much better pre-nerf.  Faster to cast and much easier to pick direction.

This is a champ breaking change. Not happy jan.

replies.body:
I couldn't agree more, 

Take all her damage away if you want, i don't care! but give me the old W back!!!!
And then there is me, i have played her 13 games so far this patch. :P

Hahaha im glad one of us is having fun :P

Each time i look at my Lvl 7 banner on her i think... those were the days..

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=J1HmAltN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-14T23:19:24.211+0000)
>
> Hahaha im glad one of us is having fun :P
> 
> Each time i look at my Lvl 7 banner on her i think... those were the days..

WTH and I couldn't see any other Level7 Taliyah apart from myself T_T but yeah once I see myself now its hard to get enemy even though I play her a lot but, its really annoying to play against enemy now :/

Ps: Glad to see another level7 :P
Give me a week and i'll probably be level 7 on taliyah, at the very least level 6.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=J1HmAltN,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-15T09:18:36.721+0000)
>
> Give me a week and i'll probably be level 7 on taliyah, at the very least level 6.

Taliyah is not an easy champ to get LVL7 but GL mate ^^
I get S's like 50% of my games.
Again oath to that, the new W is useless, it doesn't make sense to change it to something that worked well into something that is impossible to hit. I refuse to play her now because of her W

> [{quoted}](name=Soulless Reaper,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=J1HmAltN,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-07-15T01:18:59.205+0000)
>
> Again oath to that, the new W is useless, it doesn't make sense to change it to something that worked well into something that is impossible to hit. I refuse to play her now because of her W

her E damage is so low, previously EW and 2hit of Q= Dead now EW and 5hit of Q= Still alive -_-"
